revised_title: The Effect of Peptone Injection on Blood Leucocytes and Plasma Properties
tldr: The author investigates the effect of peptone injection on blood leucocyte counts and plasma properties. They find that peptone blood has a significantly lower number of leucocytes and that these cells likely dissolve in the plasma. Additionally, peptone plasma has unique properties, such as a heavy precipitate called nucleo-albumen and reduced CO2 levels.
